q: In MS SQL, you are creating an availability set for your resource group. If you are creating Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) virtual machines inside the availability set, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to retrieve all the list of the virtual machine images that offer RHEL with High Availability (HA)?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. If you are required to enable High Availability features to your VM nodes, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to open the host files and set the resolution of the host name?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. You are testing the connection between the created VMs. Which of the following Azure CLI commands in Azure Cloud Shell is used to connect a VM to another VM in this scenario?
You want to use a restore path by default . An extra path is not provided with the non default path. What would you use for restoring the data in lieu of installing?

You are creating a clustered setup, thus you must enter the hostname or IP address of the instances in place of localhost. Which of the following formats you must NOT use for the host names:

1.

[tower] 
localhost ansible_connection=local 
hostA 
hostB.example.com 
172.27.0.4

2.

[tower] 
hostA 
hostB 
HostC

3.

hostA.example.com 
hostB.example.com 
HostC.example.com

4.

[tower] 
172.27.0.2 
172.27.0.3 
172.27.0.4
You are upgrading from a previous version of Ansible Tower to a newer version. What would you rename rabbing_host in your inventory?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. If you are required to enable High Availability features to your VM nodes, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to open the host files and set the resolution of the host name?

In MS SQL, you have created Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines (VMs) in an availability set of your resource group. You are testing the connection between the created VMs. Which of the following Azure CLI commands in Azure Cloud Shell is used to connect a VM to another VM in this scenario?
In Red Hat, which of these addressing schemas are followed by the GUID Partition Table?

In Red Hat, you are trying to modify the username in the Linux system and a system crash occurs. Also, you have deleted the passwd file. After restarting the system and trying to log in, you are unable to log in. 

Which of the following represents the possible solution to this issue?

a.option: If there is a backup file, say password_bkp, then rename that file to passwd in the etc directory to solve this issue
If there is a backup file, boot the file by using USB and select Try Ubuntu, then copy the backup file to the passwd file in the etc directory through terminal helps to reboot and login normally

q: In Red Hat, the temporary file storage location of your Linux machine contains no free space. Also, a single operation on your machine consumes more space to start than the available space on the tmpfs storage location. Which of the following conditions can occur when you reboot the machine?

a.option: It throws an error message, 'Not enough space'
After rebooting, the error gets fixed as the cache is deleted
Machine starts to swap from RAM to a disk and leads the system to crawl to a halt
Machine starts using the tmp storage location instead of tmpfs storage location

q:
In Red Hat Linux, a directory A contains X folders and Y files. Recursively, there are Z repetitive files inside directory A. If the following command is executed inside the directory A, then determine the output:

echo ls | wc -l

In Red Hat, two users A and B have access to the same file X. Here, user A is the owner of the file and user B has the execute permission of the file. Which of the following users is allowed to record the entries corresponding to file X is available in the access control list?

In Red Hat, if the following command is executed to find a filtered set of files within the current directory in a Linux system, then which of the following permissions is present in the filtered set of files:

find . -perm /u+x,o+x

In Red Hat, which of the following permissions must be provided to the YUM user agent over the directory in the following code of the YUM configuration file:

[main]
 cachedir=directory

In Red Hat, which of the following bash scripts is used to check the following conditions:

  • A file is readable in nature
  • A file has a size greater than zero

a.option:
if [ r==1 ] && [ s==1 ]
then
echo "It works?"
fi

q: In Red Hat, if the debug level for Yellowdog Updater Modified (YUM) command-line is set to 0, then which of the following conditions occurs?

a.option: Entire error stack is thrown to STDOUT
Entire error stack is thrown to the configured error file
First level of error stack is thrown to STDOUT

q:
In Red Hat, if the .ssh/config file is modified to contain the following configuration, then which of these statements about forwarding X11 host to example.com hosts is correct:

Rule 1:
Host *.example.com 
ForwardX11 yes

Rule 2:
Host *
ForwardX11 no

a.option: It is forwarded as the first rule takes precedence.
It is not forwarded because the second rule takes precedence.
The example.com host matches both the entries, therefore, a conflict error is thrown.
Either of the rule is selected and gets randomly applied.

q:
In Red Hat, what is the value of X in the following Bash script that is written in a shell file and is used to record the values of in-built variables:

echo ""Last program's return value: $?""
echo ""Script's PID: $$""
echo ""Number of arguments passed to script: $#""
echo ""All arguments passed to script: $X""
echo ""Script's arguments separated into different variables: $1 $2...""
In Red Hat, which of the following grep commands is used to search for the count of the empty lines that are available in the A.txt file?

In Red Hat, you enter the d command in the prompt that is displayed after executing the fdisk /dev/sda command. This action deletes the partition form the system. Which of the following actions must be taken to recover the data that is available inside this partition?

a.option: A backup gets created before the partition is deleted.
The partition image is created before it gets deleted and this image exist in the disk for a fixed amount of time.
The delete operation can be reverted to obtain the data.

q:
In Red Hat, which of the following files are loaded and executed by the GNU GRUB boot loader package during the Boot sequence:

  1. kernel
  2. initrd
  3. init.conf

In Red Hat Linux, you have a demo text file that contains some lines of text. If you are required to find the lines containing the search pattern 'experiment' and print the lines that match with the pattern in the shell, then which of the following shell commands is used to perform this task:

1. This is the first line of an experiment.
2. It is a text with an experiment.
3. Lots of errors are present.
4. So many errors, all these errors are making me sick.
5. This is a line not containing any errors.
6. This is the last line of my experiment.

In Red Hat, you have a copy of the DOS prompt on hd1. If you are required to install this DOS by using the GRUB bootloader, then which of the following command sequences allows you to control the obvious deficiency?
In Red Hat, if you are using the logrotate utility, then which of the following factors acts as a trigger for the process of compressing a log file and storing it as an archive?
In Red Hat, which of the following commands allows the user to search for all four character words in the A.txt file?
Which of the following is the correct name of the DNS server that is included in the Red Hat Enterprise Linux platform?
In Red Hat, which of the following commands is used to list all the disk partitions on a Linux machine?
In Red Hat, which of the following statements about monitoring Linux with the uptime command is correct?

a.option: It shows load on CPUs as well as disks.
It shows exponentially-damped moving averages with time constants of 1, 5, and 15 minutes.
If the load is greater than the number of CPUs, then it can indicate to the process of CPU saturation.

q: In Red Hat, if a package is installed or removed by using the dpkg command, then which of the following directories records the logs?

In Red Hat, you must use the ss command to see whether port 53 is connected to the provided IP. Which of the following is the correct way of performing this task:

IP

108.104.084.102
In Red Hat Linux, if you have an issue with CPU cycles wasted on I/O processes, then which of the following tools is used to resolve the issue?
In Red Hat, if an attribute is defined in the [main] and [repository] sections of the yum.conf file, then which of the following denotes the value of the attribute?

a.option: One defined in the repository section
One defined in the main section
Both the defined values get merged
Error message is thrown: Attribute value defined twice

q: In Red Hat, multiple students have an account on a central Linux OS. If you are required to restrict a student from viewing the home directory of another student, then which of the following permissions must be set on the home directories of every student?

In Red Hat, which of the following functionalities is supported by the yum.conf file:

  1. Configure the process by which YUM command-line must operate
  2. Configure the repository management schemes

In Red Hat, if a module is loaded with the concept of loaded Linux Kernel modules (LKM) as opposed to the process of associating it to the base kernel. Which of the following statements represents the advantage of performing this action?

a.option: LKMs are much faster than base kernel modules
Debug rebooting is a slow process but contains much higher functionality for troubleshooting

q: In Red Hat, if you are not considering all other I/O activities that are performed, then what is the effect on the disk I/O activity with the increase in the number of processes that are swapped in and out from the memory?

In Red Hat, a new log file is created by using the /etc/rsyslog.conf command. This file contains a default permission mode A. What is the output of the A & 007 expression where & denotes the logical AND operation?

In Red Hat, a bash script contains a set of Yellowdog Updater Modified commands for installing all the dependency of an application. Which of the following parameters will you pass to these commands to avoid asking for user permission while installing the commands?

In Red Hat, there are two packages named A and B in which package A has a dependency on package B. If the package A is removed by using the rpm command, then which of the following statements is correct?

a.option: First package A is removed and then package B is removed
First package B is removed and then package A is removed

q:
In Red Hat, if the provided command is used to change the username Smith to Sam, then which of these actions occurs to the home directory of Smith:

usermod -l "Sam" Smith

a.option: It is renamed to /home/Sam and all files and directory inside it gets deleted

q:
In Red Hat, the definition of this declaration must be modified in such a way that X holds the value Alans Store. Which of the following is the correct way to perform this task:

 

X='Alans Store'

In Red Hat, if you are required to create a bash script cp.sh to perform the copy operation, then which of these attributes must be used to access the source and destination FileName within the following command:

./cp.sh sourceFileName DestinationFileName
In Red Hat, which of the following methods is used to transfer a new root to its original place from the temporary mount point that is set up by using the initrd system?
In Red Hat, which of the following processes indicates that a parent node to a daemon program is a child node?

Which of the following will help you tackle the limitations of CHS Addressing in an MBR?
1. Using Logical Block Addressing
2. Creating GPT
3. Defining the Unique GUID

In Red Hat, what is the value of the arg1 argument inside the process function that is initiated by using the following command:

process arg1

You must verify the checksum to configure and install the Red Hat platform in your system. The ISO images contain the SHA256 checksum embedded in them. Which of the following commands must be entered at the installation boot prompt to test the checksum integrity of an ISO image?
In Red Hat, if the configuration of the Yellowdog Updater Modified command-line is set to /etc/yum.conf file, then determine the number of main sections that are available within /etc/yum.conf.

In Red Hat, what is the output of the printenv | grep TEST_VAR statement after executing the following commands sequentially:

  1. TEST_VAR='Hello World!'
  2. export TEST_VAR
  3. export -n TEST_VAR

a.option: In all the cases, it returns TEST_VAR=HELLO WORLD!
In all the cases, it returns TEST_VAR='HELLO WORLD!'
After the second command is executed, it returns TEST_VAR='HELLO WORLD!' and it returns nothing after the execution of the first and third command
After the second command is executed, it returns TEST_VAR=HELLO WORLD! and it returns nothing after the execution of the first and third command

q: In Red Hat, which of the following commands allows you to set two IPv6 Domain Name Server addresses to get required Domain Name Server addresses as 2001:4860:4860::8888 and 2001:4860:4860::8844?
In Red Hat, you have executed the vmstat command in the Linux host. If the value in the wa column is greater than zero, then which of the following actions is performed?

a.option: Consider checking your routing mechanisms performance
Consider checking your cache buffer usage

q: In Red Hat, you are required to override the Domain Name Server settings by using a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol server within an SA3 environment, then which of the following configuration files requires changes to its content?

The Red Hat Enterprise Linux system is installed from a network server when you start the installation process with the askmethod or repo = options methods by using either of the following protocols:

  • File Transfer Protocol
  • Hypertext Transfer Protocol
  • Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure
  • Network File System

Which of the following statements about the options that are available during the network installation is incorrect?

a.option: The Anaconda installer does not allow you to configure TCP/IP IPv4 options manually.
If you configure an interface to use both IPv4 and IPv6, the IPv4 connection must succeed otherwise the interface cannot work, even if the IPv6 connection succeeds.
The Anaconda installer supports both the IPv4 and IPv6 protocols.
By default, the Anaconda installer uses DHCP to provide network settings automatically for IPv4.

q: In MS SQL, you are configuring the availability groups for SQL Server on Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines in Azure. If you are required to use the East US 2 location and the name of the resource group as hackmyresource, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to create a resource group?

In MS SQL, you are integrating SQL Server with Linux. If you are required to create the Pacemaker cluster resource, then which of the following Bash commands is used to check whether all the Linux nodes are active?

In MS SQL, you are configuring the availability groups for SQL Server on Red Hat Enterprise Linux virtual machines in Azure. If you are required to use the East US 2 location and the name of the resource group as hackmyresource, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to create a resource group?

In MS SQL, you are creating an availability set for your resource group. If you are creating Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) virtual machines inside the availability set, then which of the following Azure CLI commands is used to retrieve all the list of the virtual machine images that offer RHEL with High Availability (HA)?

In Red Hat, you are working on a network that is being operated in the Network Information Service​​ (NIS) or Linux system. Here, specific systems in NIS contain issues whereas other systems are operating optimally on the same subnet. Which of the following statements does not justify the reason for the occurrence of these issues?

a.option: The ypbind daemon is not running on the client
The servers contain different versions of an NIS map

q: In MS SQL, you are integrating SQL Server with Linux. If you are required to create the Pacemaker cluster resource, then which of the following Bash commands is used to check whether all the Linux nodes are active?

While installing the Red Hat Enterprise Linux system, you receive a fatal signal 11. This is commonly known as a segmentation fault and it is caused by the program that is accessing a memory address that has not been assigned. Which of the following steps will you implement to solve this issue:

  1. Disable CPU cache in BIOS
  2. Memory around in the motherboard slots
  3. Reinstall or replace the boot loader
  4. Run the installation with more kernel memory

In Red Hat, the .emerg mode is set in the rsyslog.conf file. The /var/log directory contains three log files cron.log, messages.log, and secure.log. If an emerg priority message is received from the cron daemon process, then determine the number of files that are logging the message.

While installing the Red Hat Enterprise Linux platform in your computer, your computer's screen appears distorted or becomes blank when you click the Install button or when you upgrade the options of an existing system. This occurs because the installation program is unable to load the relevant driver for the card.

In this scenario, which of the following alternative boot menu options must be used to fix this issue?

a.option: Boot the system again from the local drive
Install the system with basic video drivers
